author: Aphinya Dechalert
description: Lessons learned from previous coding experiences.

quotes.quote: The point of code is to act as a communication tool between developers.
...sometimes comments are required because they enrich the current code.
When code begins to nest, one needs to address it right away — even if it’s not your code.
Good code is explicit in what it wants to achieve and what it represents.
Don’t trust anyone that promises you time.
The core concept behind TDD is to test scenarios...

title: When Code Turns Into a Horror Story
